data.eml:eml: Position of the dentifera-group in the Coronatella-branch and its relocation to a new genus: Magnospina gen. n. (Crustacea, Chydoridae, Aloninae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sousa, Francisco Diogo R., Elmoor-Loureiro, Lourdes Maria Abdu, Santos, Sandro (2016): Position of the dentifera-group in the Coronatella-branch and its relocation to a new genus: Magnospina gen. n. (Crustacea, Chydoridae, Aloninae). ZooKeys 586: 95-119, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.586.8209, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.586.8209
